text: My 2.5yo daughter really enjoys the classes. We love super bubbly Laoshi and I personally get impressed with the masterpieces they manage to create even with a kid this age.

The Moyuan teachers are highly experienced, and the teaching methods and materials are rich and professionalðŸ¥°. My child has learned many different skills and techniques here, from sketching to oil painting to calligraphy. Each course has brought new insights and gains to my child.
